Text.Name: RedWallDownLeftS
Text.Desc: A wall unique to Wudang Sect that uses the same building method but can be used to create a room after size reduction.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Observe
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Try to learn the construction method of this building.
